name: Forestry (itch)
description:
In this game, you will become a beekeeper whose goal is to breed different species of bees to create new species, generate resources and, ultimately, improve the habitat of your beloved creatures. 

Each bee has a genome which defines items which are produced by them, the production rate and other properties. Combining bees may result in a mutation which is the only way to progress and create new resources. 

There are 2,581,644 possible genotypes, 121,296 of which are reachable.
There are currently 7 resources, 5 of which are required to finish the demo.
There are 10 different bee species to breed.

The goal is to build an alveary, the second type of bee-breeding facility.
